name: The Star Sydney
description: The Star Sydney is a world-class entertainment destination. Beyond its expansive casino, it boasts luxury hotel rooms and suites, an array of award-winning restaurants by renowned chefs, vibrant bars, a high-energy nightclub, and a serene spa. The complex offers stunning views of Darling Harbour and the city skyline, making it a landmark in Sydney's entertainment scene.
shortDescription: Iconic entertainment complex and casino in Sydney.
gamingFacilities: Extensive main casino floor with table games (Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, Craps, Poker variants)
Over 1,500 electronic gaming machines (pokies)
Dedicated Poker room hosting regular tournaments and cash games
VIP gaming salons (Sovereign Room, Inner Sanctum) for high rollers
Stadium Gaming - electronic table games with live dealers
amenities: Multiple luxury hotel accommodation options (The Star Grand Hotel, The Darling)
Over 20 restaurants and bars, including fine dining and casual eateries
The Star Event Centre for concerts and shows
The Darling Spa - luxury spa and wellness treatments

name: Crown Melbourne
description: Crown Melbourne is an iconic landmark in Melbourne, offering an unparalleled integrated resort experience. It features three world-class hotels, a vast casino, luxury shopping, acclaimed restaurants, lively bars, and spectacular entertainment venues, all situated on the picturesque Yarra River.
shortDescription: Huge resort and casino on Melbourne's Yarra River.
gamingFacilities: One of the largest casino floors in the Southern Hemisphere
Wide variety of table games including Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, Craps, Sic Bo, Pai Gow
Over 2,600 electronic gaming machines
Renowned Crown Poker Room, home to the Aussie Millions
Exclusive VIP gaming areas like the Mahogany Room
Teak Room for high-stakes Baccarat
Dedicated eSports zone (HyperX Esports Arena - check operational status)
amenities: Three luxury hotels: Crown Towers, Crown Metropol, Crown Promenade
Extensive list of fine dining and casual restaurants (e.g., Nobu, Rockpool Bar & Grill)
Luxury retail shopping (Prada, Louis Vuitton, etc.)
The Palms at Crown entertainment venue
Multiple swimming pools and fitness centers

name: The Star Gold Coast
description: Located in the heart of Broadbeach, The Star Gold Coast is a premier leisure and entertainment destination. It offers luxurious hotel accommodation, a wide range of dining experiences, lively bars, a state-of-the-art theatre, and a vibrant casino, all set against the backdrop of Queensland's beautiful coastline.
shortDescription: Resort and casino on the Gold Coast with great entertainment.
gamingFacilities: Modern casino floor with a variety of table games
Over 1,400 electronic gaming machines
Poker room with regular tournaments
VIP gaming rooms (e.g., The Sovereign Room)
Outdoor gaming terrace
amenities: Multiple hotel towers including The Star Grand and The Darling Gold Coast
Award-winning restaurants (e.g., Kiyomi, Nineteen at The Star)
Theatre hosting live shows and concerts

name: Crown Perth
description: Crown Perth is Western Australia's leading integrated resort, offering a combination of luxury accommodation, premium gaming facilities, fine dining, and world-class entertainment. Situated on the Swan River, it provides a picturesque setting for a comprehensive resort experience.
shortDescription: Luxury resort and casino on the Swan River in Perth.
gamingFacilities: 24/7 casino operations
Wide selection of table games
Over 2,000 electronic gaming machines
Dedicated Poker room
Pearl Room for VIP gaming
Riviera Room for high-limit table games
amenities: Three hotels: Crown Towers Perth, Crown Metropol Perth, Crown Promenade Perth
Numerous restaurants and bars (e.g., Nobu, Rockpool Bar & Grill, Bistro Guillaume)

name: Treasury Brisbane
description: Housed in two magnificent heritage buildings, Treasury Brisbane offers a unique boutique casino and hotel experience. It combines historical charm with modern gaming, luxury accommodation, and a selection of fine dining restaurants and bars in the heart of Brisbane city.
shortDescription: Heritage casino and hotel in the heart of Brisbane.
gamingFacilities: Casino spread across multiple levels of the historic Treasury Building
Table games including Blackjack, Roulette, Baccarat, Poker variants
Over 1,300 electronic gaming machines
Poker room
VIP gaming areas
amenities: Luxury hotel rooms and suites in the Treasury Hotel building
